author: Owari Dragon

text: Heh.  One of the comments mentioned that the cover is odd due to the fact that the guy is wearing a modern T shirt and there's giant monsters behind him.  The reason for that is explained in the opening.  He's from the 'real world' and gets drawn into the fantasy realm during the intro.

text:
A year later: It's about a boy that is on a quest to find his parents, and accidentally ends up in a fantasy realm, and has to explore and fight his was through the labyrinth.  It was quite fun when I first bought it. Not sure if it's stood the test of time tho!
P.S. Sorry for the super late reply

text:
This was the fourth Kato/Mitsuda combo, after Chrono Trigger, Xenogears and Chrono Cross, but before KiRite and World Destruction.

As usual, a great experience!
